componentDescription: A versatile component for organizing and displaying content in separate, selectable sections.

tabs.description: Array of tab objects to be displayed. Each tab needs a unique `value`. (Data-driven approach)

defaultValue.description: Optional value of the tab to be active initially. Defaults to the first tab if not provided or not found.
defaultValue.defaultValue: first tab if not provided or not found

onTabChange.description: Optional callback function triggered when the active tab changes. Receives the newly active tab object.

views.description: Optional styles object to customize the appearance of the tabs container, headers, text, and content area.

iconPosition.description: Optional position of the icon relative to the text in tab headers.

renderTab.type: (tab: Tab, isActive: boolean, onClick: () => void) => React.ReactNode
renderTab.description: Optional custom renderer for a single tab header. Receives the tab data, whether it's currently active, and an onClick handler to activate the tab.

renderContent.description: Optional custom renderer for the content area. Receives the currently active tab object. If not provided, the `content` property from the active tab object will be rendered.

value.description: Current value for controlled compound component pattern

onValueChange.description: Callback when tab value changes in compound component pattern
